# for-loops{}
> AI governance, agentic AI, and AI security engineering by Sagar Gogineni.
> Building open-source tooling for EU AI Act compliance.

## About
- [About Sagar Gogineni](https://for-loops.com/#about): AI Engineer based in Berlin. 5+ years building AI pipelines across banking, pharma, and automotive. MSc in Computer Science from SRH Berlin — thesis on Knowledge Graph-powered RAG for Medical Insights & Reasoning Analytics. Focus areas: EU AI Act, Agentic AI, AI Security.

## Projects
- [AgentGuard](https://github.com/Sagar-Gogineni/agentguard): Open-source Python SDK for EU AI Act compliance — risk classification, bias detection, transparency enforcement, and audit trail generation.

## Writing
- [Medium Articles](https://medium.com/@sagargr111): Technical deep-dives on EU AI Act compliance, AI governance, and building compliance tooling for engineering teams.
